name: Penguin Problems (GentleCatStudio)
description:
The penguins are in a sticky situation, they are on sheet of ice that has drifted away and is slowly melting. Scare the penguins away with explosions (I don't know why either I just needed something) and guide them towards safe ice.

Try to see how long you can keep the penguins alive.

Controls:

 Click on a hexagon to explode it. All penguins will run away from the explosion.
